user_query: I'm planning a family trip to Peru and we want to watch televised football matches. Can you provide me with a list of competitions and the teams participating in them? Also, give me details about the upcoming events and predictions for the matches happening today.

TaskList.description: Fetch a list of current football competitions taking place in Peru, along with the teams participating in each competition.
Gather details about the upcoming football matches in Peru, including dates and times.
Retrieve match predictions for the football matches happening today in Peru.
